showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . Fuel prices were competitive and the pumps were clean. It looks like they are in the process of remodeling, which unlike some reviewers, adds points in my book. The bathrooms are clean and new. The shower was one of the nicest I‚Äôve seen. ‚Ä¶

1st time stopped here , the guy inside is really nice , he welcomed me ,  as he recognized my accent we started talking as friends.
Shower for 8 $ only , perfectly clean.

The worst truck plaza I've ever been to, they are  (NOT OPEN 24/7).... the shower rooms are filthy, bad showers heads no drain cover on shower floor shower stall was dirty, towels smelled like burnt oil.. the parking lot is very unlevel and ‚Ä¶

Not the best stop in the world but the shower was sooooo much nicer than expected. It's on the back of the building which sucks but for $8 I'm beyond impressed.

Truck driver friendly with a good quality shower!

The most discussed shower I've ever seen. Shower floor broke, hair stuck to the walls of the shower, and the toilet my God I'd have better hygiene taking a dump next to my truck. I gagged walking in there. You'd have a better shower outside ‚Ä¶

The restaurant is  closed. The shower was nice & hot, but the room was cold probably because the entrance to the showers is from the back, outside entrance. Looks like they are still remodeling. The towels & washcloths are thin.
Shower was above par, people were helpful and polite, food was decent. I'd recommend any trucker traveling Highway 20 stop here.
Great place, clean quiet and fabulous remodeled shower with double heads. Omg!!! Diesel is priced well....
It's not a pilot or loves but it was clean. As the shower I can't speak on that. Bathroom clean store clean and friendly worker's

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ mornings experience isn't like it usually is. Not sure if they hired new people but definitely sucked.tried to shower and no one has cleaned them apparently. 7 people waiting in line. Tried to get breakfast and asked simple questions ‚Ä¶
best and clean truck stop.arrived at night parking available.morning shift 8am oct 21, were very nice to me.clean shower ,water pressure needs update but overall good job. definitely be back
Clean convenient, fuel is a lil cheaper and the shower is clean

‚Ä¶ called the pilot , now one 9 , and everything is exactly the same crap . The scheme is simple . They charge $17 per shower . But if you check, you have shower points. So if you want to swim, then they have problems. 2 times per shower is ‚Ä¶

We had to wait awhile for a shower but the customer service made up for it. Terry was very nice and accommodating. There are only 4 showers and the women's restroom is just a single room but both were very clean. Parking was pretty easy. Ov ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ not my truck I park at the parking lot. Can I take a shower then she start talking I don‚Äôt know why she had a bad day or what‚Äôs going on with her, but she was such a racist lady that she is not supposed to work as a customer service ‚Ä¶

Better for sure since renovations but still have to fix the hot water takes forever to warm up sometimes and got cold on me for the last time getting winter now makes me not want to shower here again still an issue 6 months later. And wish ‚Ä¶
Plenty of parking and no 4wheelers...showers are clean and the staff is friendly....beware shower stall 2's water pressure will put you into the wall harder than Dale Earnhardt..RHPD

‚Ä¶ and buy hammer. It ends up that I ran out of hours and had to stay here this evening. Some of the nicest people here and the best shower I've had in a long time. A couple employees that stand out our Dale and Brandon. It was really nice ‚Ä¶

Stopped to take shower and I‚Äôve been out here for 27yrs and is the worst shower I ever had!! They actually had a shower curtain and was nasty and by the time I got out the floor was soaked and everything was soaked cause it‚Äôs way to small!! ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: The staff is super awesome ü§© and friendly. ‚ÄúEveryone‚Äù‚Ä¶The showers are over all clean. The parking is kind of small, however, there is parking across the street, McDonald‚Äôs, road silting and right across from Burger King, there‚Äôs also truck ‚Ä¶

Great OLD facility with tightly- spaced amenities.  Great CSRs that keep the older facility in tip top shape (red- head younger guy is AWESOME). Restrooms were always clean on my stay and the food was okay onside (with mainstream vendors within walking distance to allow for more choices).

I want thank this store for their hospitality even during our break down. The black gentleman who gave us fresh clean showers and especially Corey who helped me above and beyond. Thank you all employees for making me no plan breakdown a pleasure !

Clean Store and showers. Customer Service is always great here. Forgot my headset in the shower last week and picked up today. Front Counter staff is very polite and helpful. Thank you for your wonderful service as always.
Would have given it 5 stars if it had a restaurant. It did however have hot clean showers/restrooms and every employee seemed friendly.

little small as far as Flying J Travel Centers go, not many car parking spots if you plan to stay the night. Bathrooms were very clean though and the attentant was super nice, she even gave me an extra chicken wing because one of them was small.

Great Stop
Considering the heavy traffic in the area,  this stop was convenient.  Clean restrooms,  nice store.  Great pet area.  Clean peaking lot.

Just came here to put fuel and to take a shower and for my surprise the private toilet in the shower room had not even been cleaned out or not even flushed. Disgusting to find the toilet full of üí© ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ run down, and poorly managed. The showers always smell disgusting, like, there is a certain specific nasty musty smell to a TA shower that if you put me in one eyes blindfolded I‚Äôd know I‚Äôm at a TA. The restrooms are always filthy. It‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

I got to shower here and it was very cleaned, no complaints there...the best. I wanted to get a quick bite and got me a chicken quesadilla and spicy chicken burrito. Love the quesadilla, but I was able to eat 1/2 of the burrito... I felt I ‚Ä¶

Driver don‚Äôt even exit this i80 exit 197 brooklyn TA I wanna take shower. I have a shower, but the lazy ass lady look like Indian. She say you don‚Äôt have shower I show her my app I have a shower she insult  me and I walk away. She‚Äôs a very ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Cleanest laundry machines I've seen out on the road. Had to wait for a shower at 11am on a Friday but they are very clean as well. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I had shop put new steer tires on truck, changed out thermostat and fix my A/C. I also took a shower and even visited the restaurant. I even washed laundry. This place is just very very nice people and very very clean. Corporate TA could ‚Ä¶

The showers are nasty!!!! That's all there really is to say about this place... Oh and the Pizza is way over cooked and greasy. I did manage to speak with a manager who did apologies for the service that we received and was extremely ‚Ä¶

Shower was filthy. Stubble left in the sink, shower floor all wet. Most places wipe it up before the next person. Then when I told the cashier about it, all she said she could notify the person. Most good places would have given me my ‚Ä¶
2 reasons - 1 star each - waitress very slow and not busy at all. Next, shower still had a lot of hair on floor and in the shower stall along with mold on the ceiling. I am normally not a complainer.
